main event: A white saucer was observed moving very high and very fast near Tinker AFB, Oklahoma on September 8, 1952.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for a short duration and involved a single object., The object was seen moving without any visible trail or exhaust., The observer reported the object's high altitude and speed., It circled to the west, crossed its path, and then headed east before disappearing., Other known air traffic in the area was an AF jet landing at Tinker AFB around the same time.
witness description: The observer was located 28 miles northwest of Tinker AFB in Oklahoma City.
